text: The 2016–17 season was Al Ahly's 58th season in the Egyptian Premier League and 58th consecutive season in the top flight of Egyptian football. The club participated in the Premier League, Egypt Cup, Super Cup, and the CAF Champions League. ==Squad== ===Current squad=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left; font-size:90%; width:80%;" |- ! style="background:#f00;
